Sentencas: This work proposes an improvement in performance with respect to the electrical efficiency of a bioethanol-fuelled Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) system by replacing a conventional distillation column by a pervaporation unit in the bioethanol purification process.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation

Sentencas: The simulation study indicates that the membrane separation factor has a significant influence on the electrical power and heat energy required to generate a feed of 25 mol% ethanol in water to the reformer.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation

Sentencas: The values of overall electrical efficiency of the SOFC systems with a distillation column and with a pervaporation unit are compared under the thermally self-sufficient condition (Q(net)=0) which offers their maximum electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation

Sentencas: At the base case, the SOFC system with a pervaporation unit provides an electrical efficiency of 42% compared with 34% achieved from the system with a distillation unit, indicating a significant improvement by using a pervaporation unit.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation

Sentencas: An increase in ethanol recovery can further improve the overall electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation

Sentencas: The study also reveals that further improvement of the membrane selectivity can slightly enhance the overall efficiency of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation

Sentencas: Finally, an economic analysis of a bioethanol-fuelled SOFC system with pervaporation is suggested as the basis for further development.
Titulo: Performance improvement of bioethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell system by using penraporation
